value.title: Using Machine Learning To Reduce Carbon Emissions In The Trucking Industry

value.title: Deep Neural Networks Market Booming Worldwide with leading Players Google, Oracle, Microsoft, IBM
value.excerpt: Global Deep Neural Networks Market The global Deep Neural Networks Market size was valued at USD 1.26 Billion in 2019 and is anticipated to reach USD 5.98 Billion by 2027 at a CAGR of 21.4%. The global neural networks market is growing predominantly as the demand for implementing the deep neural network in healthcare and BFSI sectors are flourishing extensively.

value.title: Study: MRI with machine learning reveals brain changes from PTSD
value.excerpt: A new machine learning approach added to conventional magnetic resonance imaging can identify the regions of the brain causing dissociative symptoms in people with post-traumatic stress disorder, researchers found.

value.title: 4 things to remember when adapting AI/ML learning models during a pandemic

value.title: AI Machine Learning Breakthrough Is a Twist on Brain Replay
value.excerpt: From a neuroscience perspective, the concept of brain replay is analogous to a streaming service that activates repeat showings from its vast archives of stored pre-recorded content. The brain can replay memories by reactivating the neural activity patterns that represent prior experiences whether asleep or awake.
